Title: Sell rice and grain straw to the state for the revolution, support the nation's paper making industry
Publisher: Revolutionary Committee of Suzhou 'East is Red' Paper Factory, People's Paper Factory (苏州市东方红造纸厂人民造纸厂革命委员会)
Notes: Supporting paper production means, i.a., supporting the publication of writings by Mao Zedong. The Mao quote on top of the poster reads "China will have a relatively great influence on humanity" (中国应当对人类有较大的贡献).
